description:
G-Wrench, Snips, and Swen have a tough battle against Vise and Catherine. Vise watches them stand up each time they`re knocked down, and comes to realize the strength of their feelings. G-Wrench`s feelings let her draw out even more power! Meanwhile, strange things begin to happen to Mona.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A・レンチ マックストルク
